references.paper_title: Optimized potential initialization for low-latency spiking neural networks
references.reason: This paper proposes an optimized potential initialization method to reduce latency in spiking neural networks, a key topic addressed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal ann-snn conversion for high-accuracy and ultra-low-latency spiking neural networks
references.reason: This paper focuses on efficient conversion of artificial neural networks to spiking neural networks, a central theme of the target paper, aiming for high accuracy and low latency.

references.paper_title: Spiking deep convolutional neural networks for energy-efficient object recognition
references.reason: This work is a foundational paper on applying deep learning principles to spiking neural networks, a crucial area of research for the target paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal conversion of conventional artificial neural networks to spiking neural networks
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the ANN-to-SNN conversion problem that is a key component of the methods proposed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Temporal efficient training of spiking neural network via gradient re-weighting
references.reason: This paper presents a temporal-efficient training method for spiking neural networks, an important factor considered for improving the efficiency of SNNs in the target paper.
